title: Auslan for families [five stories]
creator_credit: Raffi Ghazarian, Chisholm Institute Education Development Unit and VSDC Services for Deaf Children
brief_description: Companion piece to ‘Auslan for families: vocabulary. Episodes 1-5’ [313556], in which the signs demonstrated there are acted out in five scenes of varying length around the themes of family, school, shopping, food and play. Intended as a language teaching program for parents of deaf children from a non-English speaking background; a voiceover accompanies the signing. Performers include: Kathryn Smith, Gerard Hynes, Caitlyn Johnson, Trent Beasly.
